demoCode.s:
<view>
    <view class="line">输入框 input</view>
    <view s-for="item in inputGroup">
        <gov-input
            ipt-item-type="{{item.iptItemType}}"
            ipt-title="{{item.iptTitle}}"
            ipt-name="{{item.iptName}}"
            placeholder-content="{{item.placeholderContent}}"
            ipt-value="{{item.iptValue}}"
            type="{{item.type}}"
            password="{{item.password}}"
            maxlength="{{item.maxLength}}"
            focus="{{item.focus}}"
            disabled="{{item.disabled}}"
            confirm-type="{{item.confirmType}}"
            border-style="border-bottom: 1rpx #0f0 solid;"
            ipt-error-info="{{item.iptErrorInfo}}"
            ipt-notic-info="{{item.iptNoticInfo}}"
            bindkeyinput="iptKeyInput"
            bindiptblur="iptBlur"
            bindiptfocus="iptFocus"
            bindiptconfirm="iptConfirm"
            bindiptclean="handleClean">
        </gov-input>
    </view>
</view>

attributes.name: iptItemType
attributes.description: 'long':普通长(六字标题) 'short':普通短(四字标题) 'two-row':标题两行情况

attributes.name: confirm-type
attributes.description: 键盘右下角按钮 send:发送 search:搜索 next:下一个 go:前往 done:完成

attributes.name: iptNoticInfo
attributes.description: 控制输入块后面的notic图标展现及文案（有toast、modal可选）

events.name: keyinput
events.description: 键盘输入时触发，返回当前 input 信息

events.name: iptblur
events.description: 输入框失焦时触发，返回当前 input 信息

events.name: iptfocus
events.description: 输入框聚焦时触发，返回当前 input 信息

events.name: iptclean
events.description: 监听清空事件，返回当前 input 信息

externalClasses.name: gov-input
externalClasses.description: 输入框的扩展样式类，可通过此class改变输入框的样式
